title: Senior Merchandise Specialist (Digital)
company_name: CÔNG TY CỔ PHẦN THƯƠNG MẠI NGUYỄN KIM
job_description:
JOB PURPOSE
The Merchandise Specialist role acts as a buyer for the company, and is responsible for screening and pricing all stock that is dropped off at the stores and will require open communication with both staff and supplier.
RESPONSIBILITIES
CATEGORY MANAGEMENT
To develop category management of all business units aligned with the company directions
To be aware of the market trend and list the product on time
To ensure that the customers can get what they want in our stores in each category of General Merchandise Group
Analyze the sales trend and adjust the products offering to the customers to ensure the best customer satisfaction.
DEVELOPMENT ASSORTMENT
To be responsible for inventory management and coordinate with Store chains to make necessary proposals to ensure stock is well controlled and business is most efficient.
To develop and implement visual merchandising strategy in the entire Nguyen Kim system.
To develop competitive price strategy aligned with company directions
To develop and maintain strong relationship with strategic suppliers, ensure the sustainable strategic cooperation along with the company’s development directions
OTHER:
To consult & propose objectives, strategy, and concerned policies of General Merchandise Group to Sale Development & General Merchandising Manager
To conduct other tasks assigned by Sale Development & General Merchandising Manager
Be participated in the internal / external training to reinforce knowledge and improve capacity for work / management under career specialization.
requirements:
Bachelor’s Degree
Minimum 4 years in the equivalent positions and 4 years working in General Merchandise business
Outstanding interaction competence & problem-solving capabilities.
Negotiation skills
Ability to write emails professionally
Comprehensive in writing and verbal communication skills in English & Vietnamese.
Attitude, behavior: open minded and pro-active, personal integrity, customer focus, sharing the knowledge.
